name: A National Army
description: After years of turmoil and socialist mismanagement, the Emilia region is economically ruined. While the might of our foreign allies have imparted a small degree of stability on the region, to maintain order and defend our nation, we must begin to create a domestic army.

name: Guardia Appennina
description: Thousands of brave souls resisted Socialist tyranny from the rugged Emilian hills. Veterans of this conflict have invaluable knowledge of the terrain and non-conventional warfare. We should recruit these partisans as instructors and consultants for a new elite Alpine force.

name: Military Arsenals
description: To ensure we never again lack the armaments to supply our soldiers, we should establish our first military arsenals.

name: Efficient Arms Manufacturing
description: Our arsenals are now fully established and as their production volume increases, so too does the cost of each individual piece of equipment decrease. By encouraging simplification of the production process, we can produce arms more efficiently.

name: Artillery Manufacturing
description: Through the process of optimising small arms production, our arsenals have gained valuable insight into armaments manufacturing in general. With this knowledge, we can begin to develop domestic artillery.

name: Strict Drilling Standards
description: To effectively utilise their new equipment, our soldiers must be thoroughly prepared for the realities of warfare. By enforcing strict standards of drilling, our men will be able to use their weapons to their fullest even under harsh conditions.

name: Spirit of Resistance
description: EMI_spirit_of_resitance

name: Rally the People
description: Through a concentrated propaganda campaign emphasising the success our recent military reorganisation, we can encourage the people to serve in the armed forces.

name: Ferrari Aircraft
description: With the Ferrari company now under state control, we can take advantage of its staff's engineering expertise to develop new aircraft designs, regardless of the childish insistence of the founder. If he will not lend us a hand, we will force our hand and ensure his factories will produce what we need when we need it; one man can't stop history!

name: Airman Training
description: To rule the skies, we will need competent pilots. We must develop a concrete doctrine for the training of our airmen.

name: New Planes
description: While we have already made great strides in the field of aviation, to fight effectively, we will need to develop even more advanced aircraft.

name: Fighter Prototypes
description: New aircraft should not be rushed into production. Prototypes must undergo extensive testing, including in near-combat conditions, before entering service.

name: Efficient Manufacturing
description: Cutting edge aircraft are often inhibited by bottlenecks in the production process. By encouraging extreme efficiency throughout the production process, these bottlenecks can be partially alleviated.

name: The Academy of Modena
description: Without competent officers, any army is doomed to failure. Thus, we must establish a central officer academy.

name: Wounds of War
description: Our nation was ravaged by the Weltkrieg and the ensuing Italian civil war. We must work to heal the deep societal wounds which plague our land.

name: Avoiding Famine
description: The countryside will be slow to fully recover from its present state of devastation. To avoid famine, we must put our industry to work producing foodstuffs with imported meat and produce.

name: Italian Breadbasket
description: Italy was once an important centre of agriculture, and through a concerted effort to repair the damaged countryside and stimulate food production, in our little country at least, it can be again.

name: Re Establishing Growth
description: The economy is in shambles after so many years of war and socialism. We must outline our economic bureaucracy and stimulate economic growth.

name: Primary Schooling
description: Even prior to the Weltkrieg, Emilia was largely devoid of primary schools. As a result, many in our nation go without any sort of formal education. We should establish a school system for young children.

name: The University of Parma
description: Parma is an important cultural centre in Emilia and is the perfect place to establish a new state sponsored university focusing on research and development.

name: Recover Rural Productivity
description: The countryside is in disrepair, and if it is to ever again become productive, a concerted governmental effort must be made.

name: Improve Rural Infrastructure
description: Many small cities in Emilia lack any connection to our commercial hubs. Let us at last truly bring our people together.

name: Enhance Rural Productivity
description: With the countryside no longer in total ruin, we can now begin to actually improve its productivity.

name: Ferrari Factories
description: The Ferrari company operated its largest factory in our nation, and this facility has remained largely undamaged by the devastation of the past decades. We should nationalise these facilities and put them to work rebuilding our nation.

name: Large Scale Industrial Plants
description: Many of our largest industrial complexes were completely ruined during the civil war. Let us repair and even expand them.

name: Heavy Manufacturing
description: To sustain our industrialisation, we will need to develop heavier industry.

name: Automotive Specialisation
description: With such a large number of automotive factories, we have the ability to specialise therein and corner the market.

name: Great Minds of Modena
description: The government has called for the establishment of an advisory council of our greatest scientists and industrialists. Let us establish the council.

name: Captains of Industry
description: The advice our government has received from Modena's industrialists has greatly improved our industrial efficiency. We should make an effort to implement their more ambitious suggestions.

name: Motorisation Effort
description: The Emilian automotive industry was among the greatest in Europe, and despite the devastation of the past decades, we still retain the capacity to produce a large number of motor vehicles. With Ferrari nationalised, we should focus on the motorisation of our armed forces.

name: Engine Quality Control
description: The vehicles which were produced at Ferrari were refined and housed engines of singular quality. We should draw on the Ferrari engineer's quality control expertise for our military vehicles.

name: End the Anarchy
description: EMI_rid_of_anarchy

name: The New Constitution
description: After so many years of socialist tyranny, our people are wary of any government. We must create a constitution which respects both the people and the government.

name: Emilian Identity
description: Italy is now only a geographic construct. In place of an Italian identity, we must promote a unique Emilian culture and national identity.

name: Save the Emilian Language
description: The Emilian language, while quite similar to Italian is by no means simply an Italian dialect. The language declined rapidly under Italian rule, and if we to truly foster an Emilian identity, this cornerstone of Emilian culture must be preserved.
